metadata.title: CVE-2024-43849 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soc: qcom: pdr: protect locator_addr with the main mutexIf the service locator server is restarted fast enough, the PDR canrewrite locator_addr fields concurrently. Protect them by placingmodification of those fields under the main pdr->lock.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
